description: A bit of this, a bit of that to know in order to manage the Coworking space.

digitalSignage.description:
Manage the content displayed on the Coworking space screens.

You can create, modify, and schedule messages, announcements, or events to keep members informed. The service is password-protected.
digitalSignage.title: Screens

events.description: Organize the events displayed in the mobile app, managed through Google Calendar.

features.label: How does it work?
list: The calendar can only be modified with the account "coworking-metz@gmail.com".
The Markdown format is supported in the event description.
To add pictures in the gallery, paste links ending with ".png" or ".jpg".

The first link which is not a picture nor in Markdown format will be used for the "Check" button.
All other links (outside of Markdown format) will be hidden.
Events with the "All day" period are not very well supported.

events.title: Events

guide.description:
A collaborative document that gathers all the important information for the board members.

It is regularly updated and contains sections on member management, event organization, administrative procedures, and much more.
guide.title: Team Memo

title: More
